title: Abdellah Bidane
text: Abdellah Bidane (born 19 August 1967), also known as Abdellah Bidar, is a former <a href="Morocco">Moroccan</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who played for <a href="Morocco%20national%20football%20team">Morocco</a> in the <a href="1986%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1986 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="CODM%20Mekn%C3%A8s">CODM Meknès</a>.
